meta.title: RoutingBridge — Optimize your routes in seconds
meta.description: RoutingBridge: plan, optimize and share your delivery routes. CSV import, interactive map, driver sharing via WhatsApp, real-time tracking. From €11.90/truck/month.

hero.title: Optimize your routes in seconds.
hero.description: Import your orders, plan on the map, share with drivers via WhatsApp, track in real time.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps from your orders to delivery.

steps.title: 1. Import your orders
steps.desc: CSV import or manual creation in a few clicks.

steps.title: 2. Optimize on the map
steps.desc: Route optimization algorithm + drag & drop to adjust.

steps.title: 3. Share & track
steps.desc: Send the route sheet via WhatsApp. Live GPS tracking.

features.title: Key features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to plan and track your deliveries, without complexity.

list.title: Automatic optimization
list.desc: Reduce kilometers and travel time with our route optimization algorithm.

list.title: Interactive map
list.desc: Visualize your routes on OpenStreetMap. Built-in geocoding.

list.title: Drag & drop
list.desc: Rearrange the sequence and transfer stops between vehicles with a simple drag.

list.title: Driver sharing
list.desc: Send the route via WhatsApp or web link. No app to install.

list.title: Real-time tracking
list.desc: See each driver's progress — ahead or behind schedule — in real time.

list.title: PDF route sheets
list.desc: Generate and print route sheets for your field teams.

connectivity.title: Simple connectivity, zero friction
connectivity.subtitle: Communicate with your drivers using the tools they already use.

items.title: WhatsApp
items.desc: Share the route in 1 click via WhatsApp Web or mobile. Free, no paid API.

items.title: Driver web link
items.desc: The driver opens a simple link in their browser. No app to install.

items.title: Live geolocation
items.desc: GPS position shared in real time with driver permission. Based on OpenStreetMap.

items.title: Security & GDPR
items.desc: Data hosted in Europe. Company-level access control. Geolocation only with consent.

pricing.title: Volume pricing, all inclusive
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees, no commitment. Only pay for your active trucks.
pricing.tieredNote: Automatic volume discount based on fleet size.

items.q: Do drivers need to install an app?
items.a: No. The driver receives a simple web link that they open in their browser (Chrome, Safari…). No app to download, no account to create.
Yes. RoutingBridge uses native WhatsApp sharing (via web link or mobile). There is no paid API, no extra cost.
Yes, via a CSV export from Excel. RoutingBridge accepts CSV files with addresses or GPS coordinates.
When the driver opens their route link, they can share their GPS position (with their permission). You then see their progress in real time on the map.

items.q: Can I cancel at any time?
items.a: Yes. The subscription has no commitment. You can cancel from your account dashboard, and access remains active until the end of the paid month.
